message: Hi Bob, I propose a fair split of $5000 each. Accepting now prevents any devaluation that might occur in later rounds. Looking forward to a prompt agreement!
Hi Alice, considering the inflation affecting my share, I propose $6000 for me and $4000 for you. This offer balances our needs while addressing the devaluation issue. Let's settle this round!

Hi Bob, I understand the inflation is increasingly impacting your share. In this round, I propose to take $550 and offer you $9450. With your share being worth 10% less this round, your effective value comes to about $8505—just a bit above what you might secure if you waited and became proposer next round. Let’s agree now to avoid further devaluation!
